show.title: One Night Stand
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/K7L7wT
show.description: A traditional groom-to-be unexpectedly falls in love with an escort during his bachelor party, throwing his arranged marriage plans into chaos when he declares his intention to marry her instead.
show.description_secondary: A traditional groom-to-be unexpectedly falls in love with an escort during his bachelor party, throwing his arranged marriage plans into chaos when he declares his intention to marry her instead.
